title: Lux Shop Incorrect Details
body:
The "Master Elementalist Edition" advertises "Elementalist Lux, 10 icons and the Elementalist ward" but when you click it for more details it says you only receive 5 of the 10 icons,  Magma, Storm, Mystic, Ice and Dark icons. Not a big deal but some people might second guess buying it if they see that. Hope I helped

~ Kind regards, Ben.

replies.body:
I believe this is because the Elementalist Lux skin itself comes with 5 Icons. The other five (the ones listed there) are the ones that you get through the bundle for a total of 10 icons. (Well, 11 if you get it before December 14, 2016)

See [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/233073948-Elementalist-Lux-FAQ) under "What does Elementalist Lux come with?" for details about which are which.
Thanks guys I never even noticed that.

Talked to KateyKhaos the other day and it's the same answer she gave to me.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

You actually do get 10 icons from Master Elementalist Edition
http://imgur.com/u9fufAw
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/elementalist-lux
If you look carefully, you can see that the skin comes with 5 icons too, making 10 icons.
